Pre-Game Insights: The ICC World Cup 2023 game between Pakistan and Sri Lanka will be played on Tuesday, October 10, 2023.
The match between Pakistan and Sri Lanka will be played at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad.
Star Sports Network has acquired the rights to broadcast the ICC ODI World Cup 2023.
The live streaming of the match between Pakistan and Sri Lanka will be on Disney+ Hotstar.
According to Dafabet, the odds for the match are Pakistan at 1.48 and Sri Lanka at 2.74.
